title: Study of the jet fragmentation with two particle correlations in Pb-Pb collisions at sqrt(sNN) = 2.76 TeV by ALICE
description: I was presenting recent ALICE measurements on dihadron correlations in heavy ion collisions.

title: The first p-Pb measurements at sqrt(sNN) = 5.02 TeV by ALICE
venue: Annual meeting of the Finnish Physical Society 2013
description: I presented the first p-Pb results at 5.02 TeV measured by the ALICE collaboration.

title: Jet fragmentation transverse momentum studies with ALICE
description: I was presenting the results of my PhD thesis.

title: Jet transverse fragmentation momentum from h-h correlations in pp and p-Pb collisions
description: I was presenting the results of my PhD thesis.

title: Jets shapes in high energy heavy ion collisions with CMS
venue: Argonne National Laboratory Heavy ion discussion group
description: I gave an introductory talk to heavy ion collisions and jet shape measurements in CMS.

title: Latest results on jet suppression and jet substructure in heavy-ion collisions with CMS
description: I gave an overview talk on recent jet measurements done in the CMS heavy ion group.

title: Jet shapes, dijets and jet axes in CMS
description: I presented a poster showing jet shapes and an importance on jet axis selection for jet measurements.

title: Study of in-medium modification of dijets in PbPb collisions at 5.02 TeV with CMS
description: I presented the jet shape measurement I performed using CMS data.

title: Studies of in-medium modification of dijets in PbPb collisions at 5.02 TeV with the CMS detector
description: I was presenting my first to CMS analyses.

title: Recent jet substructure measurements in heavy-ion collisions with the CMS experiment
description: I gave an overview talk of recent jet substructure measurements done in the CMS heavy ion group.

title: Resolving medium properties using high-pT jets with jet and in-jet correlations in PbPb collisions at 5.02 TeV with the CMS detector
description: I was presenting my first to CMS analyses.

title: How to measure energy-energy correlators from heavy ion collisions
venue: Probing QCD at High Energy and Density with Jets
description: I gave a presentation on measuring energy-energy correlators from heavy ion collisions.

title: Experimental determination of energy-energy correlators in heavy ion collisions
description: I was invited to give a talk on how to measure energy-energy correlators from heavy ion collisions.
